name: Oatmeal Strawberry Bread
author: Kat
summary: I came up with this bread late one night because I had too many strawberry that were about to go bad. I love it. This works equally well with fresh or frozen strawberries.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Stir together the flour, 1 1/2 cups rolled oats, sugar, cinnamon, baking powder, and salt in a large mixing bowl
In another bowl, whisk together the vegetable oil and eggs; stir into flour mixture until just moistened
Pour into the prepared loaf pans, and sprinkle the tops with the remaining 1/4 cup of rolled oats
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 50 to 60 minutes
Cool the strawberry bread in the pans for 5 minutes before cooling completely on a wire rack
